p: Chaenomeles species are multifunctional plants that are widely used in food, medicinal and ornamental decoration. Ornamental use is mainly based on petal color, while edible and medicinal use of Chaenomeles species is limited to its fruits, which are rich in flavonoids. Due to the health benefits of flavonoid consumption, a growing number of plant flowers are used to make scented tea, such as jasmine-scented tea [ 24], rose tea [ 25], peony tea [ 26], and chrysanthemum tea [ 27]. Chaenomeles petals are also rich in flavonoids, and this study systematically studied their flavonoid metabolite profiles in order to provide a reference for future work.
